original_text: there's a reason why halftime is only fifteen minutes long .
generated_text:
1. "The plot is so dull, I was checking my watch every five minutes."
2. "I'd rather be stuck in a never-ending loop of elevator music than sit through this movie again."
3. "Time seems to stand still during the most boring parts of this film."
4. "The pacing is so slow, I'm surprised the movie didn't put me to sleep."
